name: Gem Guardian
description:
Welcome, Gem Guardian.

Gem Guardian is a simple arcade game with simple controls and a simple objective. Using the WASD or Arrow keys, move from node to node in order to stop the invaders from reaching the gems in the middle.

The task is simple, but enemies will start to spawn faster and faster as the game progress. Will you be able to protect the gem? Will you be able to drive off the horde? Will you be remembered for generations to come? Probably not, but try and set a high score anyway.

Good luck
